search_term: Find the official pricing page URL for Mews (mews.com). Only provide the exact URL to the pricing page, not a summary of pricing information.
response_text: The official Mews pricing page can be found at: [https://www.mews.com/en/products/pms/pricing](https://www.mews.com/en/products/pms/pricing)【3:0†source】.

citations.title: Mews pricing | Three tiers of hotel management pricing

extracted_content.content:
Pricing plans

Find a plan that works for you
------------------------------

Every hotel is unique. And one pricing plan shouldn't fit all. Find the right plan for your property here and see payback on your investment in just seven months\*.

1/3

### Essentials

Designed to automate workflows, while driving revenue with more direct bookings.

**Included as standard:**

Mew﻿s PMS
---------

**The highlights:**

*   Easy-to-use booking engine that drives direct bookings
*   Guest portal for online check-in and upselling
*   Exportable reports for simplified accounting
*   Embedded, automated payments platform
*   Automated front office operations, including Mews Kiosk
*   8 Mews Marketplace integrations
*   24/7 chat bot support

### **Recommended add-ons:**

Atomize RMS
-----------

The highlights:

*   Revenue-driving rate recommendations
*   Automated workflows that save staff up to 30 hours per month
*   All your data in one place for faster, smarter decision making
*   Additional add-ons include AI forecasting and real-time optimization.

Bookable Services
-----------------

**The highlights:**

*   Manage and upsell bookable services like parking spaces, bikes or experiences

### Advanced

Unlock a customizable guest journey that drives brand loyalty and makes every stay a memorable one.

**Everything in Essentials, plus:**

Advanced Guest Experience
-------------------------

**The highlights:**

*   Customizable booking engine integrated on your own website
*   Automated SMS check-in reminders
*   Digital Key for contactless check-in

### **Recommended add-ons:**

Atomize RMS
-----------

The highlights:

*   Revenue-driving rate recommendations
*   Automated workflows that save staff up to 30 hours per month
*   All your data in one place for faster, smarter decision making
*   Additional add-ons include AI forecasting and real-time optimization.

Bookable Services
-----------------

**The highlights:**

*   Manage and upsell bookable services like parking spaces, bikes or experiences

### Enterprise

Take control of your business, with insights and access to solutions that help you deliver exceptional stays time and time again.

**Everythi﻿ng in Advanced, plus:**

Mews A﻿nalytics
---------------

**The highlights:**

*   Advanced financial analytics
*   Interactive dashboards for instant visibility into key metrics

Mews Ope﻿n API
--------------

**The highlights:**

*   Booking Engine API
*   Channel Manager API
*   Connector API to connect any system to Mews. From accounting and loyalty to events and kiosk, to name a few

Unlimited Mews Marketplace
--------------------------

**The highlights:**

*   Choose from 1000+ integrations with leading hospitality tech
*   Direct connections to Expedia & Booking.com
*   No implementation fees

### **Recommended add-ons:**

Atomize RMS
-----------

The highlights:

*   Revenue-driving rate recommendations
*   Automated workflows that save staff up to 30 hours per month
*   All your data in one place for faster, smarter decision making
*   Additional add-ons include AI forecasting and real-time optimization.

Bookable Services
-----------------

**The highlights:**

*   Manage and upsell bookable services like parking spaces, bikes or experiences

### Portfolio

A plan designed to maximize efficiency with a customizable guest journey that drives brand loyalty and makes every stay a memorable one.

**Includ﻿ed as standard:**

Mews PMS
--------

**The highlights:**

*   Easy-to-use booking engine that drives direct bookings
*   Guest portal for online check-in and upselling
*   Exportable reports for simplified accounting
*   Embedded, automated payments platform
*   Automated front office operations, including Mews Kiosk

*   24/7 chat bot support

Mews Mu﻿lti-Property
--------------------

**The highlights:**

*   Multi-Property booking engine
*   Bulk rate management
*   Centralized, secure user management
*   Portfolio-wide dashboard for real-time insights across all properties
*   Multi-Property API

Advanced Guest Experience
-------------------------

-----------------

### Brand

An advanced plan that gives you control over your portfolio, with insights and solutions to help deliver exceptional stays at every single property.

**Everything in Portfolio, plus:**

Mews Ope﻿n API
--------------

**The highlights:**

*   Booking Engine API

*   Connector API to connect any system to Mews. From accounting and loyalty to events and kiosk, to name a few

### **Recommended add-ons:**

-----------------

### Traveler

When it comes to heads on beds, we get it. This plan is designed to make running hostels a breeze.

**Included as standard:**

Mews PMS

### Long Stay

Create remarkable stays, whether it’s for days, weeks or even months.

**Included as standard:**

Mews PMS

### **Recommended add-ons:**

-----------------

*   Manage and upsell bookable services like parking spaces, bikes or experiences

More than just a PMS
--------------------

Customize your plan to get more with Mews.

Why 12,500+ customers love Mews
-------------------------------

1/5

Kash Jagda, Operations Manager Bush Hotel, Farnham

conversion rate with Mews Booking Engine. That's 10% more than the industry average.

of transactions automated with Mews Payments. [Read more](https://www.mews.com/en/customers/boundary-london)

Kris Doyle, General Manager Leven Manchester

RevPAR increase in first four months. [Read more](https://www.mews.com/en/customers/leven-manchester)

Declan Fitzhenry, Managing Director The Regent

![Image 21: Life House - USA](https://www.mews.com/hs-fs/hubfs/_2023_update/Property%20Logos%20(Black)/Life%20House%20-%20USA.png?width=296&height=165&name=Life%20House%20-%20USA.png)

Romain Stern, Head of Sales  & Revenue Management 9Hotel Collection

Florian Ultsch, COO harry’s home and Adler Hotels

faster with guests checking in online. [Read more](https://www.mews.com/en/customers/harrys-home)

Fredrik Ternsjö, Head of Revenue  Distribution and Systems Ligula

boost in online check-ins through SMS reminders (at Samesun Toronto). [Read more](https://www.mews.com/en/customers/samesun)

Maud Saulnier, Manager Auberge Adveniat

Ryan Sanders, CEO Haka House

Jack McCabe, VP of Strategy Method Co.

FAQs

What is Mews?
-------------

Mews is a cloud-based property management system that goes beyond putting heads in beds. From booking to check-out, Mews offers hoteliers all the tools they need to make a guest's stay remarkable, increasing guest loyalty and driving revenue at the same time.

How easy is Me﻿ws to set up and use?
------------------------------------

Mews is built for simplicity, so you can be up and running quickly. Our intuitive design, self-service guest tools and automation features help you run operations efficiently with a small team.

Does Mews ﻿help me get more direct bookings?
--------------------------------------------

Yes! Mews includes a built-in booking engine designed for higher conversion rates. You can take direct reservations through your website, automate upsells and reduce reliance on OTAs.

What integrations are available for indep﻿endent hotels?
--------------------------------------------------------

With 8 pre-integrated Marketplace apps included in your plan, you can connect key tools like channel managers, accounting software and guest engagement platforms.

How does﻿ Mews handle payments?
-------------------------------

Mews offers secure, automated payments, so you can process transactions effortlessly. Whether that's deposits, pre-authorizations or guest payments on arrival.

What ﻿kind of support does Mews provide?
----------------------------------------

You’ll have 24/7 chat support, plus access to Mews University for training and resources to keep your team confident and efficient. Premium support is also offered at an additional fee.

What is﻿ Mews?
--------------

Mews is a cloud-native property management system that goes beyond putting heads in beds. From booking to check-out, Mews offers hoteliers all the tools they need to make a guest's stay remarkable, increasing guest loyalty and driving revenue at the same time.

How does Mews﻿ help manage multiple properties?
-----------------------------------------------

Mews provides a centralized dashboard where you can oversee all locations, manage bulk rate and inventory updates and gain insights into portfolio-wide performance.

Why do I need a booking engine specif﻿ically for multiple properties?
---------------------------------------------------------------------

Mews Multi-Property booking engine puts your entire portfolio front and center. Guests can see all your properties in one place, making it easier to make bookings across multiple hotels.

Can I integrate Mews with my existing enterprise tech stack?
------------------------------------------------------------

With the Brand plan, unlock connectivity to 1,000+ pre-built integrations in our Marketplace, a flexible Open API for custom connections, and access to our Multi-Property API. Hotel Groups can easily plug into industry-leading tools for distribution, revenue management, and more connect to private systems to fit their exact needs.

How does Mews ensure security and comp﻿liance for large hotel groups?
---------------------------------------------------------------------

Mews is built with enterprise-grade security to protect guest data and business operations across multiple properties. Mews is PCI-DSS Level 1 certified and GDPR-compliant, so your payments and data remain fully protected across all locations.

What onboarding and sup﻿port options are available?
---------------------------------------------------

Mews provides expert support through specialized teams, comprehensive training programs, and enterprise support options to ensure a smooth onboarding experience and ongoing assistance.

What is Mews?
-------------

Mews is a cloud-based property management system that goes beyond putting heads in beds. From booking to check-out, Mews offers hoteliers all the tools they need to make a guest's stay remarkable, increasing guest loyalty and driving revenue at the same time.

How does Mews support hostels and long-stay properties?
-------------------------------------------------------

Mews is built for flexible stays, offering bed- and room-level inventory management, long-stay pricing and guest experience automation.

Can gue﻿sts manage their bookings and payments online?
------------------------------------------------------

Yes! With the Mews Guest Portal, guests can extend stays, make payments and check in digitally. That means less pressure on the front desk .

How does Mews handle payments fo﻿r long-term stays?
---------------------------------------------------

Mews supports recurring payments, deposits and automated invoicing, ensuring smooth financial management for extended stays.

Can I manage ﻿private rooms, coworking spaces, and other bookable services in Mews?
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Yes! With Mews Spaces, you can manage more than just beds and rooms. Offer and monetize coworking spaces, meeting rooms and other bookable services all within the same platform.

What kind of support does Mews provide?
---------------------------------------

You’ll have 24/7 chat support, plus access to Mews University for training and resources to keep your team confident and efficient. Premium support is also offered at an additional fee.

Make it remarkable.

Ready to take the first step towards a more efficient, flexible, guest-centric approach to hospitality?

See the three levels of Mews pricing, with each package designed for a different level or service to meet all needs. Prices are also by room or by bed.
